channel.title: 2 Simple questions
channel.description:
I am using DarkQuest.
1. My npc scripts tell my player and the npc to be set to "busy", however whenever I test it out my player is able to move freely while in the middle of a conversation. How do I fix this? I put: player.setBusy(true); npc.setBust(true);
exactly where it should be, it works with moparclassic but with my darkquest source it seems to have no effect.
2. How do I make it so that players cannot walk through npcs? I was playing real RSC a few days ago and noticed that you could not do this.
ty

item.title: 2 Simple questions
item.dc:creator: @da_real_hype da real hype
item.description:
@da_real_hype wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:9, topic:461944”][quote author=Snemo link=topic=564895.msg4112170#msg4112170 date=1348620176]

then how do i fix it…? and he said it was just not in use, never mentioned that it wasnt working

You learn Java then fix it yourself, that’s how.

These help forums are in existence so that players not as fluent with java may ask others for help, you idiot.
[/quote]This isn’t a Java help board… If you read the description it’s for asking questions, not trying to get people to do everything for you.[/quote]

what hes trying to say make 1 topic thats asks 1 question. more than 1 question hes doing everything for u and thats not Ok but on topic… if your adding a custom npc and it works with the default npcs look at that code and see what u did wrong

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Simple questions
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

[quote=“Snemo, post:1, topic:461944”]I am using DarkQuest.

  1. My npc scripts tell my player and the npc to be set to “busy”, however whenever I test it out my player is able to move freely while in the middle of a conversation. How do I fix this?
    I put: player.setBusy(true);
    npc.setBust(true);

exactly where it should be, it works with moparclassic but with my darkquest source it seems to have no effect.

  1. How do I make it so that players cannot walk through npcs? I was playing real RSC a few days ago and noticed that you could not do this.

ty[/quote]

  1. I think it is just to avoid getting stuck if you close the chat menu options frame without selecting any option.

  2. PathHandler but isn’t put to use.

private boolean isMobBlocking(int x, int y) { // ActiveTile t = world.getTile(x, y); // if (mob instanceof Player) { // if (t.hasNpcs()) { // for (Npc n : t.getNpcs()) { // if (n.getDef().isAggressive() && !n.getLocation().inWilderness()) // return true; // } // } // } // if (mob instanceof Npc) { // Npc n = (Npc) mob; // if (n.getChasing() != null) // if (t.hasPlayers() && t.getPlayers().contains(n.getChasing())) // if (x == n.getChasing().getX() && y == n.getChasing().getY()) // return false; // if (t.hasNpcs() || (t.hasPlayers() && n.getChasing() != null)) // return true; // } // t.cleanItself(); return false; }

Read full topic
